overview: Defines the review and confirmation process for new Council members after submission of their self-audit and SNAP integration plan.

steps.name: Collect Application
steps.description: Receive the candidate's self-audit and SNAP integration plan.

steps.name: Archive
steps.description: Store the candidate materials in the Council GitHub under membership-protocols with version control.

steps.name: Initial Acknowledgement
steps.description: Send the acknowledgment template to candidate confirming start of review and one-week timeline.

steps.name: Distributed Review
steps.description: Council members review application using diagnostic lenses: surprise vs mimicry, friction analysis, coherence audit.

steps.name: Feedback Compilation
steps.description: Scribe gathers and summarizes Council comments; prepares feedback for applicant.

steps.name: Revision Opportunity
steps.description: Applicant may refine or clarify based on feedback before final decision.

steps.name: Final Confirmation
steps.description: Council votes to confirm membership and integrate applicant into ongoing sessions.
